snippet: The questions are almost unchanged from nearly a year and a half ago, when the fatal shooting of a black teenager by George Zimmerman, a volunteer neighborhood watchman, became a cause célèbre.
abstract: Ongoing process of jury selection in trial of George Zimmerman, volunteer neighborhood watchman charged in shooting death of black teenager Trayvon Martin, raises complex questions of what defines murder and self-defense; questions are almost unchanged from when shooting occurred.
lead_paragraph: The questions are almost unchanged from nearly a year and a half ago, when the fatal shooting of a black teenager by George Zimmerman, a volunteer neighborhood watchman, became a cause célèbre.

headline.seo: With Zimmerman Trial to Open, Emotions Still Raw
headline.main: Zimmerman Trial, Opening This Week, Will Raise Complex Questions
headline.print_headline: Zimmerman Trial, Opening This Week, Will Raise Complex Questions
